meanings.definition: The art or craft of making objects from silver.
meanings.sent1: Silversmithings requires skill and precision to create beautiful silver pieces.
meanings.sent2: I admire the intricate silversmithings displayed at the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The silversmithings in the shop window sparkled like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her silversmithings were like delicate whispers of elegance in a noisy world.
meanings.sent5: The silversmithings gleamed under the sunlight, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The work or products of a silversmith.
meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various silversmithings, from rings to intricate sculptures.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often seek rare and valuable silversmithings for their collections.
meanings.sent3: The silversmithings on the shelf seemed to gossip about their previous owners.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of silversmithings was a treasure trove of memories and stories.
meanings.sent5: The antique silversmithings told tales of bygone eras through their intricate designs.

meanings.definition: The practice or business of working with silver.
meanings.sent1: Silversmithings involve melting and shaping silver into various forms.
meanings.sent2: The silversmithings industry has a long history dating back centuries.
meanings.sent3: In the world of silversmithings, creativity and craftsmanship go hand in hand.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to silversmithings turned a simple metal into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The art of silversmithings transforms raw silver into exquisite pieces of jewelry.
